strings:
In order to use the StreetPass ‘Hot Shots’
feature, you need to activate StreetPass.
Activate now?

StreetPass has been activated successfully.
Now StreetPass activity will continue even
when you finish playing the game.
StreetPass cannot be activated for any more titles on this system. Please deactivate StreetPass for one or more other software titles from ‘StreetPass Management’ in ‘System Settings’.

The use of StreetPass has been restricted
by ‘Parental Controls’.
StreetPass is not available.

An error occurred with StreetPass.
Please turn the power off, re-insert the
SD card / Game Card, and try again.

StreetPass is unavailable.
You will now return to the game.
A green dot means there's something waiting for you.
Take a look at the postcards other players have sent you.
Make changes to the postcard other people will receive from you.

You haven't completed the StreetPass setup.
Go back to the game anyway?

You haven't altered your postcard in any way.
Okay to go back?
This will save the changes you've made to your postcard. Okay?

Unable to read your previously created postcard.
Please make a new one.
Attach the chosen photograph to your postcard?
The photograph is set! Remember, if you now delete it, you won't benefit from any thumbs-ups it earns you.

Checking for newly received postcards.
Please wait...
One or more of the postcards you just received was corrupted. The corrupted data has been automatically deleted.
Some official StreetPass data that you already have was identified in the post you just received. The postcard in question has been deleted.
No new postcards have been received.
Save your current progress to collect postcards you've received. This action will overwrite your last saved game. Do you want to continue?
<val_1> of the postcards you received was considered offensive and has been deleted.
<val_2> of the postcards you received contained official StreetPass data that you already have, so it has been deleted.
You've managed more than <val_0> StreetPass encounters, which earns you a new sticker to use for embellishing photographs!
You've managed more than <val_0> StreetPass encounters, which earns you a new frame to use for embellishing photographs!
Now you've reached <val_0> ‘<string_0>’ thumbs-ups, you earn yourself <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>!
Over the Internet, you can exchange postcards with players picked at random from all over the world.
You can exchange postcards up to three times per day, but you must also wait a minimum of three hours between each exchange.
Save your current progress to exchange postcards. This action will overwrite your last saved game. Do you want to continue?
You cannot carry out any more postcard exchanges today. Please try again tomorrow.

Unable to find any postcards for exchange.
Please wait a while and then try again.

Unable to receive any postcards.
Please wait a while and then try again.

Unable to connect as the time and/or date has been changed.
Please wait a day and then try again.

The minimum three hours has not passed since your last postcard exchange.
Please try again a little later.

The SD card has been removed.
The data cannot be read, so you will now return to the game.
